ParamItem.Desc: minimum amount of stake increasing funds, delegation funds, or delegation withdrawing funds, range：[10000000000000000000, 10000000000000000000000)
ParamItem.Name: operatingThreshold

ParamItem.Desc: quantity of epoch for skake withdrawal, range：(MaxEvidenceAge, 112]
ParamItem.Name: unStakeFreezeDuration

ParamItem.Desc: quantity of base point(1BP=1?). Node's stake will be deducted(BPs*staking amount*1?) it the node sign block duplicatlly, range：(0, 10000]
ParamItem.Name: slashFractionDuplicateSign

ParamItem.Desc: quantity of base point(1bp=1%). Bonus(BPs*deduction amount for sign block duplicatlly*%) to the node who reported another's duplicated-signature, range：(0, 80]
ParamItem.Name: duplicateSignReportReward

ParamItem.Desc: quantity of epoch. During these epochs after a node duplicated-sign, others can report it, range：(0, UnStakeFreezeDuration)
ParamItem.Name: maxEvidenceAge

ParamItem.Desc: quantity of block, the total bonus amount for these blocks will be deducted from a inefficient node's stake, range：[0, 60101)
ParamItem.Name: slashBlocksReward

ParamItem.Desc: maximum gas limit per block, range：[4712388, 210000000]
ParamItem.Name: maxBlockGasLimit
